item.name: Ping end point Response Headers with post
Booking - GetBooking
item.description:
StartFragmentThis endpoint returns detailed information for a specific booking ID.EndFragment

---

StartFragment

**URL:** `GET https://restful-booker.herokuapp.com/booking/{id}`  
**Headers (Optional):**

- `Accept: application/json` (default)
    
- `Accept: application/xml`
    

**Expected Successful Response:**

json

```
{
    "firstname": "Sally",
    "lastname": "Brown", 
    "totalprice": 111,
    "depositpaid": true,
    "bookingdates": {
        "checkin": "2013-02-23",
        "checkout": "2014-10-23"
    },
    "additionalneeds": "Breakfast"
}

 ```

EndFragment
